hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT to_char(to_date(opers.t_Date_Document, 'DD.MM.RRRR HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') || opers.t_NumDayDoc AS operationId ,opers.t_Referenc AS accountId ,to_char(to_date(opers.t_Date_Document, 'DD.MM.RRRR HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS tdate /* перевод к to_char нужен для корректной обработки дат 01.04.1982|1983|1984 */ ,opers.t_InSum AS decimalCreditSum ,opers.t_OutSum AS decimalDebitSum ,opers.t_Rest AS decimalBalance ,contr.t_RecivFIO AS counteragent ,REPLACE( rsb_struct.getString('t_accnt',T_FMTBLOBDATA_XXXX,0), CHR(0), '' ) AS counteragentAccount ,REPLACE( rsb_struct.getString('t_coraccnt' ,T_FMTBLOBDATA_XXXX,0), CHR(0), '' ) AS counteragentCorAccount ,REPLACE( rsb_struct.getString('t_bank' ,T_FMTBLOBDATA_XXXX,0), CHR(0), '' ) AS counteragentBank ,opers.t_Ground AS description ,opers.t_Code_Currency AS currencyId ,opers.t_NumDayDoc AS dayNumber ,opers.t_ordernum AS documentNumber FROM dsbdepdoc_dbt opers left join drt_paym_dbt contr on opers.t_ApplicationKey = contr.t_ApplicationKey AND opers.t_iapplicationkind = contr.t_iapplicationkind left join dpcestim_dbt pcestim on opers.t_applicationkey = pcestim.t_docapplicationkey and pcestim.t_Action not IN (2, 11) WHERE opers.t_Referenc = :id AND opers.t_Date_Document >= :fromDate AND opers.t_Date_Document <= :toDate AND opers.t_KindOp NOT IN (8, 9, 14, 15, 16) AND opers.t_Action NOT IN (2, 11) AND opers.t_TypeOper NOT IN (38, 39, 94) AND opers.t_mode <> 2 AND bitand(opers.t_Flags, 131072) = 0 AND bitand(opers.t_Flags, 17) = 0 AND opers.t_FlagStorn = CHR(0) AND ( opers.t_InSum <> 0 OR opers.t_OutSum <> 0 ) --AND (MOD(opers.t_Flags, 262144) - MOD(opers.t_Flags, 131072)) = 0 ORDER BY opers.t_Date_Document, opers.t_NumDayDoc
SELECT opers.UnionPart AS unionPart FROM sbdepdoc_dbt opers
